block.p: Kara Lynn Berklich, a marketing executive, and Ben Weber, an actor, were married yesterday on the Outer Banks of North Carolina. The Rev. Thomas LeGrand, a Baptist minister who is a cousin of the bride, officiated.

Mrs. Weber, 28, is the vice president for marketing, in New York, for Streetmail, an Internet company that gathers news from small communities around the country and distributes local newsletters via e-mail.

Kara Lynn Berklich, a marketing executive, and Ben Weber, an actor, were married yesterday on the Outer Banks of North Carolina. The Rev. Thomas LeGrand, a Baptist minister who is a cousin of the bride, officiated.

Mrs. Weber, 28, is the vice president for marketing, in New York, for Streetmail, an Internet company that gathers news from small communities around the country and distributes local newsletters via e-mail.
She graduated from Williams College. She is the daughter of Carol and Bernard Berklich of Mount Lebanon, Pa.
Mr. Weber, also 28, has a role in ''The Broken Hearts Club: A Romantic Comedy,'' a feature film now in theaters, and also played Skipper Johnston in the first season of ''Sex in the City'' on HBO.
The bridegroom graduated from New York University. He is the son of Mary and Walter Weber, who live in Seattle.
